item.title: Passiivi: Kirjoita 1
item.description: Fill in the blanks with the correct form of the verb in passive voice. The new software    (develop) by a small team of engineers. It    (design) to be user-friendly and efficient. The project    (not expect) to be completed so quickly. After all, it    (consider) a challenging task. - How    (the software, test) before its release? - The software    (test) thoroughly by our quality assurance team.
